name: @accumulators/hashers
description: A TypeScript implementation of multiple hashing functions
author: Herodotus Dev Ltd

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p lib/pedersen && cp src/pedersen/pedersen_wasm_bg.wasm lib/pedersen && cp src/pedersen/pedersen_wasm_bg.wasm.d.ts lib/pedersen && cp src/pedersen/pedersen_wasm.js lib/pedersen && cp src/pedersen/pedersen_wasm.d.ts lib/pedersen
